query: What are the company holidays for Diwali in 2025?
response: For Diwali 2024, the company has declared holidays from 18th October to 22nd October (5 days including weekends). This covers Dhanteras, Diwali, Govardhan Puja, and Bhai Dooj. Regional offices may have additional local holidays as per state calendars. Full details available on the company's website. Employees are encouraged to take leave as per their local calendars. Remote workers are expected to maintain contact with their teams through chat and video calls. Food and beverages are allowed during office hours. Only original documents with full name and signature of the employee. Any alteration or addition of name is strictly prohibited.
